game.name: Open Close Door
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Retro FPS in the style of a Boomer Shooter! Step into the role of an agent and enter a lab filled with mutants, traps, and mad experiments of Dr. Hemlock. Uncover the dark truth, fight for survival, and discover what hides behind the locked doors. Will you survive?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Retro FPS in the style of a Boomer Shooter! Step into the role of an agent and enter a lab filled with mutants, traps, and mad experiments of Dr. Hemlock. Uncover the dark truth, fight for survival, and discover what hides behind the locked doors. Will you survive?

reviewHighlights.text: Toto je popiči projekt, pripomína mi časy z Doomu.ano sú tam chybičky, ktoré sa za ten čas opravili a stále sa na nich pracuje. možno mi trošku vadí t...
